issue.title: [R] Remove ARROW_R_WITH_ARROW flags
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11392](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11392). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-10735 did the first part of this. Once we're sure that we want to fully remove the wrapping, 

- Remove all references to ARROW_R_WITH_ARROW
- Remove arrow_available() function and all references to it (arrow must always be available)
- Update docs to remove mention of the possibility that you could have a package installation that doesn't do anything
- Remove all references to TEST_R_WITH_ARROW environment variable and remove the r_only() test wrapper

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11392?focusedCommentId=17297660) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
We probably don't want to do this for 4.0, given the specter of Solaris.
